thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 07 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Spin Master Corp Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.21

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Spin Master Corp Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.21
text:
March 7 (Reuters) - Spin Master Corp:
* SPIN MASTER REPORTS STRONG Q4 AND FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* QTRLY ‍REVENUE OF US$440.9 MILLION INCREASED 30.3% FROM US$338.4 MILLION​
* Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.25 * ‍FOR 2018, SPIN MASTER EXPECTS ITS ORGANIC GROSS PRODUCT SALES GROWTH RATE TO BE IN MID TO HIGH SINGLE DIGITS RANGE​
* ‍ ADJUSTED EBITDA MARGIN FOR 2018 IS EXPECTED TO BE CONSISTENT WITH 2017​
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.21, REVENUE VIEW $420.4 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
